Details: Heuristech Lab comprises a team of ex-IITians, ex-CSIR scientists and CDAC alumni whose sole purpose is to provide R&D solutions to professionals, amateurs and industries at low cost and also to provide training to enhance their skills. The core areas of our research are limited to Machine Learning, Digital Image Processing, Computer Vision, Cloud Computing, Big data analytics, Data mining, VLSI and Embedded Systems. Our aim is to contribute to the ever-growing scientific community and develop technologies which would make our lives easier. Our goal is also to provide high-quality skills where our students and clients can interact with our highly experienced experts from industries and premier institutions like IIT, CSIR, CDAC, etc. in different technologies to gain an insight into the field, current trends, challenges and possible solutions.We provide summer training, six-month training programmes, summer internships, thesis guidance and assist in industrial projects and B.Tech projects. We provide high-quality training in tools like Big data, Hadoop, Linux, MATLAB, Web Design, Photoshop, EDA tools, Tanner, VLSI tools, NS2, etc. We also provide training in several languages like C/C++, Python, JAVA, PHP, VHDL, Verilog, OTCL, R, DotNet, HTML, etc. We provide research thesis guidance for VLSI Design, Electrical Engineering, Software Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electronics Engineering and Communication Engineering. We can help you in choosing the research topic, writing the synopsis, in literature survey and in analysing the research problem. For this, we use tools like MATLAB, NS2, Eclipse, Android Studio, ISE and more. Contact us for details.

Details:
Dream Tech Labs"  a division of Dream Weavers, came into an existence with an idea for providing project and industrial training to the students where they will learn latest technologies in IT as they will work on live/dummy projects guided by companies. The curriculum of the Project and Industrial Training will be based on the latest technologies. The students will visit the company site, where the students will gather the inputs of the project and he can complete the project in our high tech lab in Jalandhar office under the guidance of our experienced faculty.Why D-Tech?
 In all we aim at building better professionals for tomorrow and for this purpose we provide training through skilled trainers.
 Selected Candidates may be given opportunity to work with our sister concerns. Valid Certificates will be issued to qualifying candidates marking the duration of their training, the modules undertaken, recommendations from the Team leader/Business Head, Character Certificate, etc. Candidates get to learn both the soft skills as well as the interview skills under the same roof which is extremely beneficial in shaping their career. Dream Tech Labs"  a division of Dream Weavers, came into an existence with an idea for providing project and industrial training to the students where they will learn latest technologies in IT as they will work on live/dummy projects guided by companies. The curriculum of the Project and Industrial Training will be based on the latest technologies. The students will visit the company site, where the students will gather the inputs of the project and he can complete the project in our high tech lab in Jalandhar office under the guidance of our experienced faculty.Why D-Tech?
 In all we aim at building better professionals for tomorrow and for this purpose we provide training through skilled trainers.
 Selected Candidates may be given opportunity to work with our sister concerns. Valid Certificates will be issued to qualifying candidates marking the duration of their training, the modules undertaken, recommendations from the Team leader/Business Head, Character Certificate, etc. Candidates get to learn both the soft skills as well as the interview skills under the same roof which is extremely beneficial in shaping their career. It provides a common platform for all the candidates. Candidates can get entry to a number of companies through a single medium which is highly motivating and useful for them. Details:
KnowledgeWoods Consulting is one of the largest PMI's Global Registered Education Provider (R.E.P. Provider ID - 2835) across India and Middle East, offering customer-centric Consulting, Training and Support Services in the domain of Project Management with particular emphasis on Globally Recognized Project Management Certifications like PMP, CAPM and PRINCE2, just to name a few.
Member of Microsoft Silver Learning Partner Program, KnowledgeWoods specializes in helping clients leverage the industry-leading project management softwares from Microsoft (Project Professional, Project Server, SharePoint) and Primavera to incorporate Best Practices in Project Management in the organization culture.Founded in the year 2007, KnowledgeWoods is today an ISO 9001: 2008 Certified International Training & Consulting Organization (ID  53405) working towards honing the skills of professionals through the best of training and consulting solutions in the arenas of ITSM, Project / Program / Portfolio Management, Quality Management, Customer Relationship Management, and in many more dimensions.
Till date, the organization has successfully worked with over 500 corporate clients and over 25,000+ candidates for their professional certification and/or competency development initiatives.KnowledgeWoods is also the first and till date, one of the only few training and consulting companies in India to provide Unique Offers like 100% Pass - Money Back Guarantee / Passing Assurance on most of its training programs.For further details on KnowledgeWoods Consulting and its unique portfolio of service offerings, visit: www.knowledgewoods.in

Details: NIIT Ltd. is a leading Global Talent Development Corporation, building skilled manpower pool for global industry requirements. The company which was set up in 1981, to help the nascent IT industry overcome its human resource challenges, has today grown to be amongst worlds leading talent development companies offering learning solutions to Individuals, Enterprises and Institutions across 40 countries. Leading IT journal Dataquest has conferred upon NIIT the Top IT Training Company award successively for the past 20 years, since the inception of this category. NIIT Ltd. training solutions in IT, Banking, Finance and Insurance, Knowledge Process Outsourcing (KPO), Business Process Management (BPM), Executive Management Education, Vocational Skills, School Learning Solutions and Communication and Professional Life Skills has impacted over 35 million learners since inception. NIIT Ltd. expertise in learning content development, training delivery and education process management make it the most preferred training partner, worldwide. NIIT Ltd. has been ranked 4th in Best companies to work for in India, 2013-14, by Great Place to Work Institute and Top 10 Best Employers in India- 2011 by Aon Hewitt. The company has also been voted the second most trusted education brand in India by Brand Equity- Nielsen Survey 2011. Contact us for further details.

Details:
Synergy focuses on training individuals on project management concepts and software tools such as Microsoft Office Project, MSP Server, Primavera, and Primavera Complete, Asta Power Project. The courses will be offered in 70 locations across India and in 7 countries, as listed in its website. 
Synergy also trains on PMP Certification Preparatory module, and conducts PME (Project Management Expert) Certification for PM Aspirants. 
The training outcome with Project Management Skills include: Realistic Budgeting, Resource Estimation, Testing Methods, Better Communication, and Effective Risk Management that keep the pace of production high, both qualitatively and quantitatively. Synergy enrolls Students and Professionals of Management and Engineering specialization viz., Mechanical, Civil, Electrical, Electronics, Instrumentation, Business Administration & IT
Synergy offers training on Tally software, MS Office and Placement Training through its course called Master Diploma in Business Automation. 
The School will also help students find employment in the relevant corporate firms for the respective programs.

Dream Tech Labs"  a division of Dream Weavers, came into an existence with an idea for providing project and industrial training to the students where they will learn latest technologies in IT as they will work on live/dummy projects guided by companies. The curriculum of the Project and Industrial Training will be based on the latest technologies. The students will visit the company site, where the students will gather the inputs of the project and he can complete the project in our high tech lab in Jalandhar office under the guidance of our experienced faculty.Why D-Tech?
 In all we aim at building better professionals for tomorrow and for this purpose we provide training through skilled trainers.
 Selected Candidates may be given opportunity to work with our sister concerns. Valid Certificates will be issued to qualifying candidates marking the duration of their training, the modules undertaken, recommendations from the Team leader/Business Head, Character Certificate, etc. Candidates get to learn both the soft skills as well as the interview skills under the same roof which is extremely beneficial in shaping their career. It provides a common platform for all the candidates. Candidates can get entry to a number of companies through a single medium which is highly motivating and useful for them. Name: i360 Accounts Institute
Details: i360 Accounts Institute is a vocational training institute started in 2008 with the aim of reducing the gap between employers expectations and the available talent pool, by providing necessary training to improve employability.i360 Accounts Institute is an eminent name facilitated by the promoters of Unicon Investment Solutions. With number of operational centres across India & constantly expanding, i360 Accounts Institute is a fast paced training solutions company, offering industry specific custom designed courses to the students/ corporates.Our courses have evolved after intensive R&D and market research. Since we understand the requirement of the organizations and capabilities of the students, therefore, we try to bridge the gap between the employer and the employee. Students can experience effective and easy learning at i360 Accounts Institute.We believe in following stringent and unimpeachable principles. With the distinctive mixture of right aptitude, motivated and devoted team we yearn to serve world class qualitative education. Their skill and dedication is adding to the success of the company. i360 Accounts Institute also assures bright career assistance to every promising student.

Name: i360 Staffing & Training Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
Details:
i360 Staffing & Training Solutions is a vocational training institute started in 2008 with the aim of reducing the gap between employers expectations and the available talent pool, by providing necessary training to improve employability.
i360 is an eminent name facilitated by the promoters of Unicon Investment Solutions. With number of operational centres across India & constantly expanding, i360 is a fast paced Training Solutions Company, offering industry specific custom designed courses to the students/ corporates.
Our courses have evolved after intensive R&D and market research. Since we understand the requirement of the organizations and capabilities of the students, therefore, we try to bridge the gap between the employer and the employee. Students can experience effective and easy learning at i360.
We believe in following stringent and unimpeachable principles. With the distinctive mixture of right aptitude, motivated and devoted team we yearn to serve world class qualitative education. Their skill and dedication is adding to the success of the company. i360 also assures bright career assistance to every promising student.
Considering the continuous and remarkable growth in Finance & Accounting, Retail sectors, i360 is offering different courses in Financial Accounting, Retail Management, Call Centre Training, IELTS, Career Development, Spoken English and various other courses for corporates. 
"There are plenty of employment opportunities available and they are expected to grow faster than the average." Ms. Sonia Nagpal cited a study by ICRA, which states that up to 25 crore(rpt) skilled workers would be required over the next 12 years to cater to the demand in 20 high-growth sectors and the unorganized segment.
Companies want to recruit employees with proficient managerial and communication skills. Therefore, keeping these points in mind i360 is offering various courses to the students and corporates. After completion of these courses one can explore the opportunities available in the market. In the learning atmosphere of i360 student can groom their personality and learn many fruitful things under the guidance of competent and resourceful faculty. 
i360 does have multilevel corporate engagements; starting from student placements to trainings to academic endorsements. All these associations directly or indirectly add value in a student's career. Presently, students of i360 are working with brands like Vodafone, Airtel, Pantaloons, Haldirams, Unicon, Asian Paints, Erricson to name a few
The corporate tie-ups of i360 includes many distinguished and famous organizations such as Dominos, Vishal Mega MART, Pantalons, India Infoline, Haldiram, Intouch Solutions, Airtel, NETAMBIT, Virgin Mobile and other potential companies. With the support of these companies i360 provides common platform of placement opportunities to all the students.
According to Ms. Nagpal Firstly, we try to judge the capabilities of the student and then provide them best possible solution. Every student is blessed with certain talent and here in i360 we polish their talent by grooming their overall personality. Our courses such as IELTS and Spoken English are structured in such a manner that it helps in the personality development and building self confidence. Wide range of corporate training course of i360 helps corporate in achieving desirable result.

KnowledgeWoods Consulting is one of the largest PMI's Global Registered Education Provider (R.E.P. Provider ID - 2835) across India and Middle East, offering customer-centric Consulting, Training and Support Services in the domain of Project Management with particular emphasis on Globally Recognized Project Management Certifications like PMP, CAPM and PRINCE2, just to name a few.
Member of Microsoft Silver Learning Partner Program, KnowledgeWoods specializes in helping clients leverage the industry-leading project management softwares from Microsoft (Project Professional, Project Server, SharePoint) and Primavera to incorporate Best Practices in Project Management in the organization culture.Founded in the year 2007, KnowledgeWoods is today an ISO 9001: 2008 Certified International Training & Consulting Organization (ID  53405) working towards honing the skills of professionals through the best of training and consulting solutions in the arenas of ITSM, Project / Program / Portfolio Management, Quality Management, Customer Relationship Management, and in many more dimensions.
Till date, the organization has successfully worked with over 500 corporate clients and over 25,000+ candidates for their professional certification and/or competency development initiatives.KnowledgeWoods is also the first and till date, one of the only few training and consulting companies in India to provide Unique Offers like 100% Pass - Money Back Guarantee / Passing Assurance on most of its training programs.For further details on KnowledgeWoods Consulting and its unique portfolio of service offerings, visit: www.knowledgewoods.in

The company which was set up in 1981, to help the nascent IT industry overcome its human resource challenges, has today grown to be amongst worlds leading talent development companies offering learning solutions to Individuals, Enterprises and Institutions across 40 countries. Leading IT journal Dataquest has conferred upon NIIT the Top IT Training Company award successively for the past 20 years, since the inception of this category. NIIT Ltd. training solutions in IT, Banking, Finance and Insurance, Knowledge Process Outsourcing (KPO), Business Process Management (BPM), Executive Management Education, Vocational Skills, School Learning Solutions and Communication and Professional Life Skills has impacted over 35 million learners since inception. NIIT Ltd. expertise in learning content development, training delivery and education process management make it the most preferred training partner, worldwide. NIIT Ltd. has been ranked 4th in Best companies to work for in India, 2013-14, by Great Place to Work Institute and Top 10 Best Employers in India- 2011 by Aon Hewitt. Details: When you hear about the launch of a new Web Portal, you may just say, 'There's another one'. But with the launch of Edulink.in, you might just say, "This is the one" At least, this is what we thought and wants our portal to beWith the new race of unending services and networking offered by so many portals in the online market, it just becomes hard to choose one and rely upon it. We generally choose among those portals that help us to fulfill our aim of socializing, Knowledge sharing, online shopping, career guidance, enhances employability and the likes but can you think of one portal that does it all for you probably not and that's where Edulink.in comes in.The founder of Edulink.in, Gaurav Singla, a post graduate in Master of Business Systems Professional from Monash University, Australia, along with his colleague Akchitta Srivastava, B. Tech from Thapar University Patiala, took it as a challenge to gather resources and technical know-how in an otherwise under developed IT market of Punjab and build an innovative solution indigenously that people from this area can be proud of... Obviously the task was tedious and challenging but with a lot of hard work and innovation that went into it they finally pulled the rabbit out of the hat...It is all one needs and may be a lot more From being an Educational Portal to a social networking site to an HR portal, it helps its users in choosing the right courses, set their dreams in the right directions and increase his or hers Employability Factor by giving career guidance and help land into their dream futureCampus Networking or more understandably social networking is a part of its wholesome experience and you can meet friends, classmates, and alumni of your and other schools alike, without the fear of cyber crime and imposters. Every account on Edulink.in can get a verification stamp from its institute so that the prevalent wrong practices may be reduced to a great extent; you have to be what you claim to beIt is a connection between the School, Teachers, Students and Parents alike Teachers can connect with parents of their students directly on the site as social users and interact about the regular development of the children. Likewise parents can view the school activities online and check the Home work, assignments, important events, attendance and even personalized messages from the institute, while simply surfing the net.Students immensely benefit from the intensive career counseling and employability enhancement programs conducted by Edulink.in just by surfing the website and being an active user, students can participate in various quiz contests and other online/offline competitions necessary to help them prepare for future exams. Online test papers, previous years question papers, IQ tests, Vocabulary enhancement, aptitude tests also help them stand out in the crowd. It's a no non-sense portal that even caters to your online shopping needs by coming up with offers and deals of a life time.The idea behind Edulink.in is simple to offer what is required After having worked on many softwares and technical solutions, the team of Edulink.in zeroed in on what they had learnt and experienced all these years an Educational Web Portal to link all who are in the industry and give them a common platform to offer their services and benefit from the advantages of the online world."We were already offering software and surveillance services to schools and colleges and have some very big names to our credit," says Gaurav, "following leads from many educationists about the need to develop online website and softwares for institutions as per the mandates of their respective boards and universities, we saw it as an opportunity to offer websites that do not just comply with board regulations, but also communicate with each other. A standard format of reporting that would help better organized reporting among different institutes of same group, board or university for that matter, followed by individual student profiles picked up pace. It wasn't long before we settled with an idea of putting it all up on a portal and offer these online services to our existing and prospective clients".It didn't stop just there, Value Added Services came along in the form of event management, remote Attendance management, Alumni meets, Teachers Training modules, Career Seminars started happening and institutions have just started to realize how simple and intuitive is the idea to go Online with Edulink.inAs per the recent recommendations of Punjab Government to stress imparting of vocational training and practical knowledge to the students of Punjab, we worked to fall in line with this ideology and provide opportunity to the colleges and schools to offer training to their teachers through value programs and seminars held within the institute.We got a hit of about 2,00,000 clicks even before the official launch of the portal through existing social mediums and the numbers are ticking so much so that the hosting server crashed twice as it was just not anticipated by the developers to have such a huge turnout. We then had to move to a bigger server to keep the show running and hoping that users would like the idea of bringing so much at the same place For the moment, we just want to go full on with the portal and offer seamless services to the member schools and colleges who would like to benefit from our online and offline services. We help them to stand out in the mushrooming of numerous other institutions that have come up recently So just sign up and Link www.edulink.in OUR MISSION/AIM Our aim is to ensure parents and institutes involvement in the better upbringing of the child. An informed parent can take better decisions for their child and they won't even have to take extra time out for all this activity they can do it sitting in their office or at home in their own time. OUR VISION Our Vision has always been to link people through education. We focus on creating powerful conceptual tools that equip teachers and students with innovative teaching and learning methods to bring about better academic results. We know our best was good for today; tomorrow we will do better.

Details: SLR Infotech programming language developed by Dennis Ritchie. Like most of the procedural language, C has the specialized feature for structured programming, allows variable scope and recursion. One good thing about C++ programming is, it enables mapping of constructs to machine instruction thereby requiring very minimal run-time support, and so it is widely used in application development.Training C++ is one of the main programming languages being used for more than 2 decades and C compilers are also available for most of the computer architecture and Operating Systems. C programming is still popular for its simplicity of expression, compactness of the code, wide range of applicability and limitless flexibility it has to offers.SLR Infotech offers best software training and placement in evergreen technologies like Database Developer Training , BI & Data Warehousing Training, Web Designing Training, Java Training, Software Testing Training, Microsoft Training, Oracle Applications Training, Mobile Applications Training, Cloud Computing Training, IBM Training, Other Training and more to the students.

Name: i360 Staffing & Training Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
Details:
i360 Staffing & Training Solutions is a vocational training institute started in 2008 with the aim of reducing the gap between employers expectations and the available talent pool, by providing necessary training to improve employability.
i360 is an eminent name facilitated by the promoters of Unicon Investment Solutions. With number of operational centres across India & constantly expanding, i360 is a fast paced Training Solutions Company, offering industry specific custom designed courses to the students/ corporates.
Our courses have evolved after intensive R&D and market research. Since we understand the requirement of the organizations and capabilities of the students, therefore, we try to bridge the gap between the employer and the employee. Students can experience effective and easy learning at i360.
We believe in following stringent and unimpeachable principles. With the distinctive mixture of right aptitude, motivated and devoted team we yearn to serve world class qualitative education. Their skill and dedication is adding to the success of the company. i360 also assures bright career assistance to every promising student.
Considering the continuous and remarkable growth in Finance & Accounting, Retail sectors, i360 is offering different courses in Financial Accounting, Retail Management, Call Centre Training, IELTS, Career Development, Spoken English and various other courses for corporates. 
"There are plenty of employment opportunities available and they are expected to grow faster than the average." Ms. Sonia Nagpal cited a study by ICRA, which states that up to 25 crore(rpt) skilled workers would be required over the next 12 years to cater to the demand in 20 high-growth sectors and the unorganized segment.
Companies want to recruit employees with proficient managerial and communication skills. Therefore, keeping these points in mind i360 is offering various courses to the students and corporates. After completion of these courses one can explore the opportunities available in the market. In the learning atmosphere of i360 student can groom their personality and learn many fruitful things under the guidance of competent and resourceful faculty. 
i360 does have multilevel corporate engagements; starting from student placements to trainings to academic endorsements. All these associations directly or indirectly add value in a student's career. Presently, students of i360 are working with brands like Vodafone, Airtel, Pantaloons, Haldirams, Unicon, Asian Paints, Erricson to name a few
The corporate tie-ups of i360 includes many distinguished and famous organizations such as Dominos, Vishal Mega MART, Pantalons, India Infoline, Haldiram, Intouch Solutions, Airtel, NETAMBIT, Virgin Mobile and other potential companies. With the support of these companies i360 provides common platform of placement opportunities to all the students.
According to Ms. Nagpal Firstly, we try to judge the capabilities of the student and then provide them best possible solution. Every student is blessed with certain talent and here in i360 we polish their talent by grooming their overall personality. Our courses such as IELTS and Spoken English are structured in such a manner that it helps in the personality development and building self confidence. Wide range of corporate training course of i360 helps corporate in achieving desirable result.

Details: NIIT Ltd. is a leading Global Talent Development Corporation, building skilled manpower pool for global industry requirements. The company which was set up in 1981, to help the nascent IT industry overcome its human resource challenges, has today grown to be amongst worlds leading talent development companies offering learning solutions to Individuals, Enterprises and Institutions across 40 countries. Leading IT journal Dataquest has conferred upon NIIT the Top IT Training Company award successively for the past 20 years, since the inception of this category. NIIT Ltd. training solutions in IT, Banking, Finance and Insurance, Knowledge Process Outsourcing (KPO), Business Process Management (BPM), Executive Management Education, Vocational Skills, School Learning Solutions and Communication and Professional Life Skills has impacted over 35 million learners since inception. NIIT Ltd. expertise in learning content development, training delivery and education process management make it the most preferred training partner, worldwide. NIIT Ltd. has been ranked 4th in Best companies to work for in India, 2013-14, by Great Place to Work Institute and Top 10 Best Employers in India- 2011 by Aon Hewitt. The company has also been voted the second most trusted education brand in India by Brand Equity- Nielsen Survey 2011. Contact us for further details.

Dream Tech Labs"  a division of Dream Weavers, came into an existence with an idea for providing project and industrial training to the students where they will learn latest technologies in IT as they will work on live/dummy projects guided by companies. The students will visit the company site, where the students will gather the inputs of the project and he can complete the project in our high tech lab in Jalandhar office under the guidance of our experienced faculty.Why D-Tech?
 In all we aim at building better professionals for tomorrow and for this purpose we provide training through skilled trainers.
 Selected Candidates may be given opportunity to work with our sister concerns. Valid Certificates will be issued to qualifying candidates marking the duration of their training, the modules undertaken, recommendations from the Team leader/Business Head, Character Certificate, etc. Candidates get to learn both the soft skills as well as the interview skills under the same roof which is extremely beneficial in shaping their career. It provides a common platform for all the candidates. Candidates can get entry to a number of companies through a single medium which is highly motivating and useful for them. Details: NIIT Ltd. is a leading Global Talent Development Corporation, building skilled manpower pool for global industry requirements. The company which was set up in 1981, to help the nascent IT industry overcome its human resource challenges, has today grown to be amongst worlds leading talent development companies offering learning solutions to Individuals, Enterprises and Institutions across 40 countries. Leading IT journal Dataquest has conferred upon NIIT the Top IT Training Company award successively for the past 20 years, since the inception of this category. NIIT Ltd. training solutions in IT, Banking, Finance and Insurance, Knowledge Process Outsourcing (KPO), Business Process Management (BPM), Executive Management Education, Vocational Skills, School Learning Solutions and Communication and Professional Life Skills has impacted over 35 million learners since inception. NIIT Ltd. expertise in learning content development, training delivery and education process management make it the most preferred training partner, worldwide. NIIT Ltd. has been ranked 4th in Best companies to work for in India, 2013-14, by Great Place to Work Institute and Top 10 Best Employers in India- 2011 by Aon Hewitt. The company has also been voted the second most trusted education brand in India by Brand Equity- Nielsen Survey 2011. Contact us for further details.

Business Excellence Institute Private Limited (BEI) is a Global Management Consulting, Training, Assessment and Certification Services Provider for organizations worldwide with a mission to promote excellence in the organizations for the benefit of society. Details: Piford Technologies (www.piford.com) is a leading "Software Development Company" having its offices in India, USA, and the UK. We specialise in mobile phone applications, desktop applications, and website development, specialising in software video & audio codecs targeting multimedia solutions. We are among the top software developing companies of the world. Piford Technologies is also a "Leading Computer Training Service Provider" with several years of experience in the industry. We deal with C / C++ training, android development training, Java / J2EEWe deal with C / C++ training, android development training, Java / J2EE training, .Net training, PHP & MySQL training, software testing training, iPhone development training, ASP.Net training, C Sharp (C#) training, Java / J2EE training, CCNA certification training, web design training, graphic design training, Oracle application training, VLSI designing institutes, graphic designing, advanced Java, core Java and, multi-core processor programming. We also provide 3 months / 6 months / 6 weeks industrial / professional training / summer training to engineering students. We have a fast track special trainingWe have a fast track special training programfor pass-out/ jobless students named EEP. We at PIFORD give students / jobless engineers an opportunity to work on REAL LIVE Projects and develop industry required products during their 6 weeks / 6 months / 3 months professional industrial training, respectively. We havea state-of-the-art infrastructure along with the latest gadgets and software. Our training certificate is recognised globallyand helps the students in their placements in different IT companies including Piford Technologies. We guarantee efficient service and satisfaction to our clients. We are happy to have you as our valued client. Contact us for further information.

Details: NIIT Ltd. is a leading Global Talent Development Corporation, building skilled manpower pool for global industry requirements. The company which was set up in 1981, to help the nascent IT industry overcome its human resource challenges, has today grown to be amongst worlds leading talent development companies offering learning solutions to Individuals, Enterprises and Institutions across 40 countries. Leading IT journal Dataquest has conferred upon NIIT the Top IT Training Company award successively for the past 20 years, since the inception of this category. NIIT Ltd. training solutions in IT, Banking, Finance and Insurance, Knowledge Process Outsourcing (KPO), Business Process Management (BPM), Executive Management Education, Vocational Skills, School Learning Solutions and Communication and Professional Life Skills has impacted over 35 million learners since inception. NIIT Ltd. expertise in learning content development, training delivery and education process management make it the most preferred training partner, worldwide. NIIT Ltd. has been ranked 4th in Best companies to work for in India, 2013-14, by Great Place to Work Institute and Top 10 Best Employers in India- 2011 by Aon Hewitt. The company has also been voted the second most trusted education brand in India by Brand Equity- Nielsen Survey 2011. Contact us for further details.

Details:
Dream Tech Labs"  a division of Dream Weavers, came into an existence with an idea for providing project and industrial training to the students where they will learn latest technologies in IT as they will work on live/dummy projects guided by companies. The curriculum of the Project and Industrial Training will be based on the latest technologies. The students will visit the company site, where the students will gather the inputs of the project and he can complete the project in our high tech lab in Jalandhar office under the guidance of our experienced faculty.Why D-Tech?
 In all we aim at building better professionals for tomorrow and for this purpose we provide training through skilled trainers.
 Selected Candidates may be given opportunity to work with our sister concerns. Valid Certificates will be issued to qualifying candidates marking the duration of their training, the modules undertaken, recommendations from the Team leader/Business Head, Character Certificate, etc. Candidates get to learn both the soft skills as well as the interview skills under the same roof which is extremely beneficial in shaping their career. It provides a common platform for all the candidates. Candidates can get entry to a number of companies through a single medium which is highly motivating and useful for them. In terms of technical certifications, the candidates get certified

Dream Tech Labs"  a division of Dream Weavers, came into an existence with an idea for providing project and industrial training to the students where they will learn latest technologies in IT as they will work on live/dummy projects guided by companies. The curriculum of the Project and Industrial Training will be based on the latest technologies. The students will visit the company site, where the students will gather the inputs of the project and he can complete the project in our high tech lab in Jalandhar office under the guidance of our experienced faculty.Why D-Tech?
 In all we aim at building better professionals for tomorrow and for this purpose we provide training through skilled trainers.
 Selected Candidates may be given opportunity to work with our sister concerns. Valid Certificates will be issued to qualifying candidates marking the duration of their training, the modules undertaken, recommendations from the Team leader/Business Head, Character Certificate, etc. Candidates get to learn both the soft skills as well as the interview skills under the same roof which is extremely beneficial in shaping their career. It provides a common platform for all the candidates. Candidates can get entry to a number of companies through a single medium which is highly motivating and useful for them. Details: Heuristech Lab comprises a team of ex-IITians, ex-CSIR scientists and CDAC alumni whose sole purpose is to provide R&D solutions to professionals, amateurs and industries at low cost and also to provide training to enhance their skills. The core areas of our research are limited to Machine Learning, Digital Image Processing, Computer Vision, Cloud Computing, Big data analytics, Data mining, VLSI and Embedded Systems. Our aim is to contribute to the ever-growing scientific community and develop technologies which would make our lives easier. Our goal is also to provide high-quality skills where our students and clients can interact with our highly experienced experts from industries and premier institutions like IIT, CSIR, CDAC, etc. in different technologies to gain an insight into the field, current trends, challenges and possible solutions.We provide summer training, six-month training programmes, summer internships, thesis guidance and assist in industrial projects and B.Tech projects. We provide high-quality training in tools like Big data, Hadoop, Linux, MATLAB, Web Design, Photoshop, EDA tools, Tanner, VLSI tools, NS2, etc. We also provide training in several languages like C/C++, Python, JAVA, PHP, VHDL, Verilog, OTCL, R, DotNet, HTML, etc. We provide research thesis guidance for VLSI Design, Electrical Engineering, Software Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electronics Engineering and Communication Engineering. We can help you in choosing the research topic, writing the synopsis, in literature survey and in analysing the research problem. For this, we use tools like MATLAB, NS2, Eclipse, Android Studio, ISE and more. Contact us for details.

Details:
i360 Staffing & Training Solutions is a vocational training institute started in 2008 with the aim of reducing the gap between employers expectations and the available talent pool, by providing necessary training to improve employability.
i360 is an eminent name facilitated by the promoters of Unicon Investment Solutions. With number of operational centres across India & constantly expanding, i360 is a fast paced Training Solutions Company, offering industry specific custom designed courses to the students/ corporates.
Our courses have evolved after intensive R&D and market research. Since we understand the requirement of the organizations and capabilities of the students, therefore, we try to bridge the gap between the employer and the employee. Students can experience effective and easy learning at i360.
We believe in following stringent and unimpeachable principles. With the distinctive mixture of right aptitude, motivated and devoted team we yearn to serve world class qualitative education. Their skill and dedication is adding to the success of the company. i360 also assures bright career assistance to every promising student.
Considering the continuous and remarkable growth in Finance & Accounting, Retail sectors, i360 is offering different courses in Financial Accounting, Retail Management, Call Centre Training, IELTS, Career Development, Spoken English and various other courses for corporates. 
"There are plenty of employment opportunities available and they are expected to grow faster than the average." Ms. Sonia Nagpal cited a study by ICRA, which states that up to 25 crore(rpt) skilled workers would be required over the next 12 years to cater to the demand in 20 high-growth sectors and the unorganized segment.
Companies want to recruit employees with proficient managerial and communication skills. Therefore, keeping these points in mind i360 is offering various courses to the students and corporates. After completion of these courses one can explore the opportunities available in the market. In the learning atmosphere of i360 student can groom their personality and learn many fruitful things under the guidance of competent and resourceful faculty. 
i360 does have multilevel corporate engagements; starting from student placements to trainings to academic endorsements. All these associations directly or indirectly add value in a student's career. Presently, students of i360 are working with brands like Vodafone, Airtel, Pantaloons, Haldirams, Unicon, Asian Paints, Erricson to name a few
The corporate tie-ups of i360 includes many distinguished and famous organizations such as Dominos, Vishal Mega MART, Pantalons, India Infoline, Haldiram, Intouch Solutions, Airtel, NETAMBIT, Virgin Mobile and other potential companies. With the support of these companies i360 provides common platform of placement opportunities to all the students.
According to Ms. Nagpal Firstly, we try to judge the capabilities of the student and then provide them best possible solution. Every student is blessed with certain talent and here in i360 we polish their talent by grooming their overall personality. Our courses such as IELTS and Spoken English are structured in such a manner that it helps in the personality development and building self confidence. Wide range of corporate training course of i360 helps corporate in achieving desirable result.

Dream Tech Labs"  a division of Dream Weavers, came into an existence with an idea for providing project and industrial training to the students where they will learn latest technologies in IT as they will work on live/dummy projects guided by companies. The curriculum of the Project and Industrial Training will be based on the latest technologies. The students will visit the company site, where the students will gather the inputs of the project and he can complete the project in our high tech lab in Jalandhar office under the guidance of our experienced faculty.Why D-Tech?
 In all we aim at building better professionals for tomorrow and for this purpose we provide training through skilled trainers.
 Selected Candidates may be given opportunity to work with our sister concerns. Valid Certificates will be issued to qualifying candidates marking the duration of their training, the modules undertaken, recommendations from the Team leader/Business Head, Character Certificate, etc. Candidates get to learn both the soft skills as well as the interview skills under the same roof which is extremely beneficial in shaping their career. It provides a common platform for all the candidates. Candidates can get entry to a number of companies through a single medium which is highly motivating and useful for them. In terms of technical certifications, the candidates get certified

Name: i360 Staffing & Training Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
Details:
i360 Staffing & Training Solutions is a vocational training institute started in 2008 with the aim of reducing the gap between employers expectations and the available talent pool, by providing necessary training to improve employability.
i360 is an eminent name facilitated by the promoters of Unicon Investment Solutions. With number of operational centres across India & constantly expanding, i360 is a fast paced Training Solutions Company, offering industry specific custom designed courses to the students/ corporates.
Our courses have evolved after intensive R&D and market research. Since we understand the requirement of the organizations and capabilities of the students, therefore, we try to bridge the gap between the employer and the employee. Students can experience effective and easy learning at i360.
We believe in following stringent and unimpeachable principles. With the distinctive mixture of right aptitude, motivated and devoted team we yearn to serve world class qualitative education. Their skill and dedication is adding to the success of the company. i360 also assures bright career assistance to every promising student.
Considering the continuous and remarkable growth in Finance & Accounting, Retail sectors, i360 is offering different courses in Financial Accounting, Retail Management, Call Centre Training, IELTS, Career Development, Spoken English and various other courses for corporates. 
"There are plenty of employment opportunities available and they are expected to grow faster than the average." Ms. Sonia Nagpal cited a study by ICRA, which states that up to 25 crore(rpt) skilled workers would be required over the next 12 years to cater to the demand in 20 high-growth sectors and the unorganized segment.
Companies want to recruit employees with proficient managerial and communication skills. Therefore, keeping these points in mind i360 is offering various courses to the students and corporates. After completion of these courses one can explore the opportunities available in the market. In the learning atmosphere of i360 student can groom their personality and learn many fruitful things under the guidance of competent and resourceful faculty. 
i360 does have multilevel corporate engagements; starting from student placements to trainings to academic endorsements. All these associations directly or indirectly add value in a student's career. Presently, students of i360 are working with brands like Vodafone, Airtel, Pantaloons, Haldirams, Unicon, Asian Paints, Erricson to name a few
The corporate tie-ups of i360 includes many distinguished and famous organizations such as Dominos, Vishal Mega MART, Pantalons, India Infoline, Haldiram, Intouch Solutions, Airtel, NETAMBIT, Virgin Mobile and other potential companies. With the support of these companies i360 provides common platform of placement opportunities to all the students.
According to Ms. Nagpal Firstly, we try to judge the capabilities of the student and then provide them best possible solution. Every student is blessed with certain talent and here in i360 we polish their talent by grooming their overall personality. Our courses such as IELTS and Spoken English are structured in such a manner that it helps in the personality development and building self confidence. Wide range of corporate training course of i360 helps corporate in achieving desirable result.

Details: NIIT Ltd. is a leading Global Talent Development Corporation, building skilled manpower pool for global industry requirements. The company which was set up in 1981, to help the nascent IT industry overcome its human resource challenges, has today grown to be amongst worlds leading talent development companies offering learning solutions to Individuals, Enterprises and Institutions across 40 countries. Leading IT journal Dataquest has conferred upon NIIT the Top IT Training Company award successively for the past 20 years, since the inception of this category. NIIT Ltd. training solutions in IT, Banking, Finance and Insurance, Knowledge Process Outsourcing (KPO), Business Process Management (BPM), Executive Management Education, Vocational Skills, School Learning Solutions and Communication and Professional Life Skills has impacted over 35 million learners since inception. NIIT Ltd. expertise in learning content development, training delivery and education process management make it the most preferred training partner, worldwide. NIIT Ltd. has been ranked 4th in Best companies to work for in India, 2013-14, by Great Place to Work Institute and Top 10 Best Employers in India- 2011 by Aon Hewitt. The company has also been voted the second most trusted education brand in India by Brand Equity- Nielsen Survey 2011. Contact us for further details.

Details:
Synergy focuses on training individuals on project management concepts and software tools such as Microsoft Office Project, MSP Server, Primavera, and Primavera Complete, Asta Power Project. The courses will be offered in 70 locations across India and in 7 countries, as listed in its website. 
Synergy also trains on PMP Certification Preparatory module, and conducts PME (Project Management Expert) Certification for PM Aspirants. 
The training outcome with Project Management Skills include: Realistic Budgeting, Resource Estimation, Testing Methods, Better Communication, and Effective Risk Management that keep the pace of production high, both qualitatively and quantitatively. Synergy enrolls Students and Professionals of Management and Engineering specialization viz., Mechanical, Civil, Electrical, Electronics, Instrumentation, Business Administration & IT
Synergy offers training on Tally software, MS Office and Placement Training through its course called Master Diploma in Business Automation. 
The School will also help students find employment in the relevant corporate firms for the respective programs.

Details: NIIT Ltd. is a leading Global Talent Development Corporation, building skilled manpower pool for global industry requirements. The company which was set up in 1981, to help the nascent IT industry overcome its human resource challenges, has today grown to be amongst worlds leading talent development companies offering learning solutions to Individuals, Enterprises and Institutions across 40 countries. Leading IT journal Dataquest has conferred upon NIIT the Top IT Training Company award successively for the past 20 years, since the inception of this category. NIIT Ltd. training solutions in IT, Banking, Finance and Insurance, Knowledge Process Outsourcing (KPO), Business Process Management (BPM), Executive Management Education, Vocational Skills, School Learning Solutions and Communication and Professional Life Skills has impacted over 35 million learners since inception. NIIT Ltd. expertise in learning content development, training delivery and education process management make it the most preferred training partner, worldwide. NIIT Ltd. has been ranked 4th in Best companies to work for in India, 2013-14, by Great Place to Work Institute and Top 10 Best Employers in India- 2011 by Aon Hewitt. The company has also been voted the second most trusted education brand in India by Brand Equity- Nielsen Survey 2011. Contact us for further details.

Details: NIIT Ltd. is a leading Global Talent Development Corporation, building skilled manpower pool for global industry requirements. The company which was set up in 1981, to help the nascent IT industry overcome its human resource challenges, has today grown to be amongst worlds leading talent development companies offering learning solutions to Individuals, Enterprises and Institutions across 40 countries. Leading IT journal Dataquest has conferred upon NIIT the Top IT Training Company award successively for the past 20 years, since the inception of this category. NIIT Ltd. training solutions in IT, Banking, Finance and Insurance, Knowledge Process Outsourcing (KPO), Business Process Management (BPM), Executive Management Education, Vocational Skills, School Learning Solutions and Communication and Professional Life Skills has impacted over 35 million learners since inception. NIIT Ltd. expertise in learning content development, training delivery and education process management make it the most preferred training partner, worldwide. NIIT Ltd. has been ranked 4th in Best companies to work for in India, 2013-14, by Great Place to Work Institute and Top 10 Best Employers in India- 2011 by Aon Hewitt. The company has also been voted the second most trusted education brand in India by Brand Equity- Nielsen Survey 2011. Contact us for further details.

Details: NIIT Ltd. is a leading Global Talent Development Corporation, building skilled manpower pool for global industry requirements. The company which was set up in 1981, to help the nascent IT industry overcome its human resource challenges, has today grown to be amongst worlds leading talent development companies offering learning solutions to Individuals, Enterprises and Institutions across 40 countries. Leading IT journal Dataquest has conferred upon NIIT the Top IT Training Company award successively for the past 20 years, since the inception of this category. NIIT Ltd. training solutions in IT, Banking, Finance and Insurance, Knowledge Process Outsourcing (KPO), Business Process Management (BPM), Executive Management Education, Vocational Skills, School Learning Solutions and Communication and Professional Life Skills has impacted over 35 million learners since inception. NIIT Ltd. expertise in learning content development, training delivery and education process management make it the most preferred training partner, worldwide. NIIT Ltd. has been ranked 4th in Best companies to work for in India, 2013-14, by Great Place to Work Institute and Top 10 Best Employers in India- 2011 by Aon Hewitt. The company has also been voted the second most trusted education brand in India by Brand Equity- Nielsen Survey 2011. Contact us for further details.

Details: MAAC is the high-end 3D animation & VFX education brand of Aptech. Through its wide network of centres, MAAC has prepared thousands of students for careers in animation, VFX, filmmaking, gaming, web, graphics design, and media & entertainment. The Academy provides quality education through career-oriented courses, leading to top-notch job placements.MAAC has a dedicated Research & Development team consisting of industry professionals. This team is responsible for planning the detailed curriculum for each course.The Academy conducts faculty training programs to ensure high standards of teaching in the classroom. All MAAC teachers are trained by Animation industry professionals who help sharpen their creative & technical skills.MAAC lays strong emphasis on using the best infrastructure to train students. The Academy uses high-end computers, Wacom tablets & other equipment in the classroom. The infrastructure is similar to that used in the global Animation & VFX industry. This helps create an 'on-the-job' environment in the class. As a result, MAAC students often win many Awards for the films they create.

Details:
Dream Tech Labs"  a division of Dream Weavers, came into an existence with an idea for providing project and industrial training to the students where they will learn latest technologies in IT as they will work on live/dummy projects guided by companies. The curriculum of the Project and Industrial Training will be based on the latest technologies. The students will visit the company site, where the students will gather the inputs of the project and he can complete the project in our high tech lab in Jalandhar office under the guidance of our experienced faculty.Why D-Tech?
 In all we aim at building better professionals for tomorrow and for this purpose we provide training through skilled trainers.
 Selected Candidates may be given opportunity to work with our sister concerns. Valid Certificates will be issued to qualifying candidates marking the duration of their training, the modules undertaken, recommendations from the Team leader/Business Head, Character Certificate, etc. Candidates get to learn both the soft skills as well as the interview skills under the same roof which is extremely beneficial in shaping their career. It provides a common platform for all the candidates. Candidates can get entry to a number of companies through a single medium which is highly motivating and useful for them. Details: Heuristech Lab comprises a team of ex-IITians, ex-CSIR scientists and CDAC alumni whose sole purpose is to provide R&D solutions to professionals, amateurs and industries at low cost and also to provide training to enhance their skills. The core areas of our research are limited to Machine Learning, Digital Image Processing, Computer Vision, Cloud Computing, Big data analytics, Data mining, VLSI and Embedded Systems. Our aim is to contribute to the ever-growing scientific community and develop technologies which would make our lives easier. Our goal is also to provide high-quality skills where our students and clients can interact with our highly experienced experts from industries and premier institutions like IIT, CSIR, CDAC, etc. in different technologies to gain an insight into the field, current trends, challenges and possible solutions.We provide summer training, six-month training programmes, summer internships, thesis guidance and assist in industrial projects and B.Tech projects. We provide high-quality training in tools like Big data, Hadoop, Linux, MATLAB, Web Design, Photoshop, EDA tools, Tanner, VLSI tools, NS2, etc. We also provide training in several languages like C/C++, Python, JAVA, PHP, VHDL, Verilog, OTCL, R, DotNet, HTML, etc. We provide research thesis guidance for VLSI Design, Electrical Engineering, Software Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electronics Engineering and Communication Engineering. We can help you in choosing the research topic, writing the synopsis, in literature survey and in analysing the research problem. For this, we use tools like MATLAB, NS2, Eclipse, Android Studio, ISE and more. Contact us for details.

 In all we aim at building better professionals for tomorrow and for this purpose we provide training through skilled trainers.

Details: NIIT Ltd. is a leading Global Talent Development Corporation, building skilled manpower pool for global industry requirements. The company which was set up in 1981, to help the nascent IT industry overcome its human resource challenges, has today grown to be amongst worlds leading talent development companies offering learning solutions to Individuals, Enterprises and Institutions across 40 countries. Leading IT journal Dataquest has conferred upon NIIT the Top IT Training Company award successively for the past 20 years, since the inception of this category. NIIT Ltd. training solutions in IT, Banking, Finance and Insurance, Knowledge Process Outsourcing (KPO), Business Process Management (BPM), Executive Management Education, Vocational Skills, School Learning Solutions and Communication and Professional Life Skills has impacted over 35 million learners since inception. NIIT Ltd. expertise in learning content development, training delivery and education process management make it the most preferred training partner, worldwide. NIIT Ltd. has been ranked 4th in Best companies to work for in India, 2013-14, by Great Place to Work Institute and Top 10 Best Employers in India- 2011 by Aon Hewitt. The company has also been voted the second most trusted education brand in India by Brand Equity- Nielsen Survey 2011. Contact us for further details.

Details: NIIT Ltd. is a leading Global Talent Development Corporation, building skilled manpower pool for global industry requirements. The company which was set up in 1981, to help the nascent IT industry overcome its human resource challenges, has today grown to be amongst worlds leading talent development companies offering learning solutions to Individuals, Enterprises and Institutions across 40 countries. Leading IT journal Dataquest has conferred upon NIIT the Top IT Training Company award successively for the past 20 years, since the inception of this category. NIIT Ltd. training solutions in IT, Banking, Finance and Insurance, Knowledge Process Outsourcing (KPO), Business Process Management (BPM), Executive Management Education, Vocational Skills, School Learning Solutions and Communication and Professional Life Skills has impacted over 35 million learners since inception. NIIT Ltd. has been ranked 4th in Best companies to work for in India, 2013-14, by Great Place to Work Institute and Top 10 Best Employers in India- 2011 by Aon Hewitt. Details: Arena Animation is the Animation, Web designing, VFX & Multimedia education arm of Aptech Ltd. Over the past 18 years, Arena Animation has successfully trained more than 400,000 students through its career-oriented courses. Today, TV channels bring awesome animation into our homes & the film industry is bringing out fantastic films every week. According to a report by Research & Markets, the estimated size of the Indian animation industry is US $247 million, growing at 15-20% per year. At the same time, the market outside India is much bigger & Indian companies work on outsourced international animation projects as well. Such a huge & growing industry requires thousands of skilled, trained people to work in animation studios, ad film & VFX companies, video processing & editing studios, and others. To prepare you for a well-paying career in this field, Arena Institute provides world-class education through a wide network of centres in 20 countries. Arena Animation offers a variety of animation, filmmaking, VFX, gaming, multimedia & web designing courses that get you job-ready in a few months. You can even do these courses along with attending college or a job.Contact us for further details.

Name: MAAC - Maya Academy of Advanced Cinematics
Details: MAAC is the high-end 3D animation & VFX education brand of Aptech. Through its wide network of centres, MAAC has prepared thousands of students for careers in animation, VFX, filmmaking, gaming, web, graphics design, and media & entertainment. The Academy provides quality education through career-oriented courses, leading to top-notch job placements.MAAC has a dedicated Research & Development team consisting of industry professionals. This team is responsible for planning the detailed curriculum for each course.The Academy conducts faculty training programs to ensure high standards of teaching in the classroom. All MAAC teachers are trained by Animation industry professionals who help sharpen their creative & technical skills.MAAC lays strong emphasis on using the best infrastructure to train students. The Academy uses high-end computers, Wacom tablets & other equipment in the classroom. The infrastructure is similar to that used in the global Animation & VFX industry. This helps create an 'on-the-job' environment in the class. As a result, MAAC students often win many Awards for the films they create.

Details: NIIT Ltd. is a leading Global Talent Development Corporation, building skilled manpower pool for global industry requirements. The company which was set up in 1981, to help the nascent IT industry overcome its human resource challenges, has today grown to be amongst worlds leading talent development companies offering learning solutions to Individuals, Enterprises and Institutions across 40 countries. Leading IT journal Dataquest has conferred upon NIIT the Top IT Training Company award successively for the past 20 years, since the inception of this category. NIIT Ltd. training solutions in IT, Banking, Finance and Insurance, Knowledge Process Outsourcing (KPO), Business Process Management (BPM), Executive Management Education, Vocational Skills, School Learning Solutions and Communication and Professional Life Skills has impacted over 35 million learners since inception. NIIT Ltd. expertise in learning content development, training delivery and education process management make it the most preferred training partner, worldwide. NIIT Ltd. has been ranked 4th in Best companies to work for in India, 2013-14, by Great Place to Work Institute and Top 10 Best Employers in India- 2011 by Aon Hewitt. The company has also been voted the second most trusted education brand in India by Brand Equity- Nielsen Survey 2011. Contact us for further details.

Stay ahead of the world with the pioneers in IT training and talent development, IIHT. Our job specific curriculum is strategically designed to ensure better talent-industry engagement. The training environment is integrated with cutting-edge technology, advanced infrastructure, certified trainers and organised repositories, making the learning experience at par with the global IT standards. We are here to provide a 360* career guidance; we are here to polish IT & professional skills; we are here to prepare candidates for their dream job! IIHT courses are not merely technology-specific but role/ job specific. This ensures that the knowledge gained can be applied during job role and IIHT students are known to be placed in L2 jobs directly.

Details: NIIT Ltd. is a leading Global Talent Development Corporation, building skilled manpower pool for global industry requirements. The company which was set up in 1981, to help the nascent IT industry overcome its human resource challenges, has today grown to be amongst worlds leading talent development companies offering learning solutions to Individuals, Enterprises and Institutions across 40 countries. Leading IT journal Dataquest has conferred upon NIIT the Top IT Training Company award successively for the past 20 years, since the inception of this category. NIIT Ltd. training solutions in IT, Banking, Finance and Insurance, Knowledge Process Outsourcing (KPO), Business Process Management (BPM), Executive Management Education, Vocational Skills, School Learning Solutions and Communication and Professional Life Skills has impacted over 35 million learners since inception. NIIT Ltd. expertise in learning content development, training delivery and education process management make it the most preferred training partner, worldwide. NIIT Ltd. has been ranked 4th in Best companies to work for in India, 2013-14, by Great Place to Work Institute and Top 10 Best Employers in India- 2011 by Aon Hewitt. The company has also been voted the second most trusted education brand in India by Brand Equity- Nielsen Survey 2011. Contact us for further details.

Details:
Synergy focuses on training individuals on project management concepts and software tools such as Microsoft Office Project, MSP Server, Primavera, and Primavera Complete, Asta Power Project. The courses will be offered in 70 locations across India and in 7 countries, as listed in its website. 
Synergy also trains on PMP Certification Preparatory module, and conducts PME (Project Management Expert) Certification for PM Aspirants. 
The training outcome with Project Management Skills include: Realistic Budgeting, Resource Estimation, Testing Methods, Better Communication, and Effective Risk Management that keep the pace of production high, both qualitatively and quantitatively. Synergy enrolls Students and Professionals of Management and Engineering specialization viz., Mechanical, Civil, Electrical, Electronics, Instrumentation, Business Administration & IT
Synergy offers training on Tally software, MS Office and Placement Training through its course called Master Diploma in Business Automation. 
The School will also help students find employment in the relevant corporate firms for the respective programs.

The students will visit the company site, where the students will gather the inputs of the project and he can complete the project in our high tech lab in Jalandhar office under the guidance of our experienced faculty.Why D-Tech?
 In all we aim at building better professionals for tomorrow and for this purpose we provide training through skilled trainers.
 Selected Candidates may be given opportunity to work with our sister concerns. Valid Certificates will be issued to qualifying candidates marking the duration of their training, the modules undertaken, recommendations from the Team leader/Business Head, Character Certificate, etc. Candidates get to learn both the soft skills as well as the interview skills under the same roof which is extremely beneficial in shaping their career. It provides a common platform for all the candidates. Candidates can get entry to a number of companies through a single medium which is highly motivating and useful for them. In terms of technical certifications, the candidates get certified

Details: NIIT Ltd. is a leading Global Talent Development Corporation, building skilled manpower pool for global industry requirements. The company which was set up in 1981, to help the nascent IT industry overcome its human resource challenges, has today grown to be amongst worlds leading talent development companies offering learning solutions to Individuals, Enterprises and Institutions across 40 countries. Leading IT journal Dataquest has conferred upon NIIT the Top IT Training Company award successively for the past 20 years, since the inception of this category. NIIT Ltd. training solutions in IT, Banking, Finance and Insurance, Knowledge Process Outsourcing (KPO), Business Process Management (BPM), Executive Management Education, Vocational Skills, School Learning Solutions and Communication and Professional Life Skills has impacted over 35 million learners since inception. NIIT Ltd. expertise in learning content development, training delivery and education process management make it the most preferred training partner, worldwide. NIIT Ltd. has been ranked 4th in Best companies to work for in India, 2013-14, by Great Place to Work Institute and Top 10 Best Employers in India- 2011 by Aon Hewitt. The company has also been voted the second most trusted education brand in India by Brand Equity- Nielsen Survey 2011. Contact us for further details.
